service_name: Strategy and Planning Services for Identity Management and Access Governance
page_content:
Praxism Limited

Strategy and Planning Services for Identity Management and Access Governance

The service enables organisations prepare and plan adoption of an Identity Management and Access Governance solution in a Cloud Computing environment. Consisting of four defined steps that prepare the enterprise to adopt best practice IAM and AG, organisations can opt to select only those steps where external assistance is required.

Features

  • Discovery Definition: Capture of existing “AS IS” processes and infrastructure
  • Requirement Capture: Functional solution requirements capture for IAM solution
  • Readiness Assessment: Readiness for adoption of an IAM/AG Solution adoption
  • Maturity Rating/Target: Benchmarking existing/desired IAM capabilities, processes and goals
  • Strategy Development: Construction of strategic roadmap and solution architecture
  • Security Strategy Architecture: Defines the future state process and architecture
  • Business Case: Constructed aligned with solution costs and benefits
  • Business Driven: Technology neutral, IAM strategy development
  • Cloud Model neutral: Covers Public, Private and Hybrid
  • Incorporation of Identity Management functions: Considerations within Cyber-Security Strategies

Benefits

  • Defined End-to-End IAM processes: Documented and measured with maturity scores
  • Defined Solution Requirements: Categorised and documented requirements catalogue
  • Defined IAM Strategy: Aligned with business requirements and benefits
  • IAM Posture: Addressing identified and prioritised risks
  • Defined IAM Cloud business case: Identified efficiencies and improved security
  • Engagement Approach: Reflecting business need, minimising engagement costs
  • Evolution/Implementation: Optimised future state User & Access Lifecycle processes
  • Benefit Realisation: Resultant improved efficiency and reduced costs
  • Business Engagement: Involvement of key business areas and senior stakeholder(s)
  • Optional Solution Definition: Aligned to business value and benefits

Pricing

£1100 to £1240 per person per day

  • Excluding VAT
  • Education pricing available
  • Minimum contract period: Day
